name: MedicationPackageType
title: Medication Package Type
description: Types of medication packaging for inventory tracking

concept.definition: A cardboard or paper box containing medication units (e.g., blister packs).
A bottle containing medication (tablets, capsules, or liquid).
A small glass or plastic container for injectable medications.
A sealed glass container for single-dose injectable medications.
A blister pack containing individual medication doses.
A tube containing cream, ointment, or gel medication.
A small sealed packet containing powder or granules.
A cartridge for use with injection pens or inhalers.
